Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Bill Clinton Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Colin Powell said he was concerned about what he characterized as a recent negative turn of Republican candidate John McCain 's campaign, such as the campaign's attempts to tie
